known_issues: Live app shows 'backend disconnected' error on page load; likely stale/missing backend bindings or mismatched backend canister ID in deployed frontend bundle.

existing_features.title: Perform a deterministic clean rebuild of the frontend to eliminate stale artifacts and regenerate TypeScript backend bindings from the currently deployed backend canister, using the existing script `frontend/scripts/clean-rebuild-frontend.sh`.

Redeploy the frontend canister after the clean rebuild so the Live site ships the newly generated backend bindings, using the deterministic redeploy flow in `frontend/redeploy.sh` (or equivalently: run clean rebuild then `dfx deploy frontend`).

new_feature_requests.summary: Perform a deterministic clean rebuild of the frontend that removes stale build artifacts, regenerates TypeScript backend bindings from the currently deployed backend canister, verifies the generated bindings exist, and verifies that removed legacy methods (e.g., `getAllSurgeryCases`) are not present in the generated bindings nor referenced in the frontend source.
Redeploy the frontend canister after the clean rebuild so the Live site ships the newly generated backend bindings, using the existing deterministic redeploy flow.
Verify that the Live frontend is bound to the currently deployed backend canister ID after redeploy, following the existing verification guide.

After redeploy, verify that the Live frontend is bound to the currently deployed backend canister ID by following `frontend/scripts/verify-live-backend-binding.md` (confirm the frontend is using fresh bindings and the expected backend canister ID).
